data.name: StandaloneTooltip_Desc_Key
data.value: A customizable tooltip component that can be placed anywhere on forms to provide contextual help and information

data.name: StaticContent_Desc_Key
data.value: Static tooltip content to display when hovering or clicking the icon

data.name: BoundContent_Desc_Key
data.value: Dynamic tooltip content bound to a field or formula

data.name: AllowHtml_Desc_Key
data.value: Enable HTML formatting in tooltip content (sanitized for security)

data.name: PreserveLineBreaks_Desc_Key
data.value: Convert line breaks in content to HTML breaks for better formatting

data.name: EnableDynamicContent_Desc_Key
data.value: Allow placeholders like {{current.date}}, {{user.name}} in tooltip content

data.name: IconType_Desc_Key
data.value: Type of icon to display (info, question, warning, error, help, tip, note, star, check, exclamation, arrow, dot)

data.name: CustomIcon_Desc_Key
data.value: Custom character or emoji to use as the icon (overrides Icon Type)

data.name: IconSize_Desc_Key
data.value: Size of the icon in pixels (default: 16)

data.name: IconColor_Desc_Key
data.value: Color of the icon (CSS color value, default: #605e5c)

data.name: IconStyle_Desc_Key
data.value: Visual style of the icon container (circle, square, minimal, outline)

data.name: Position_Desc_Key
data.value: How the tooltip icon is positioned (inline, floating)

data.name: IconAlignment_Desc_Key
data.value: Horizontal alignment of the icon (left, center, right)

data.name: FloatDirection_Desc_Key
data.value: Direction to float the icon when position is floating (left, right)

data.name: TooltipPlacement_Desc_Key
data.value: Preferred placement of the tooltip relative to the icon (top, bottom, left, right, auto)

data.name: TooltipOffset_Desc_Key
data.value: Distance in pixels between icon and tooltip (default: 12)

data.name: AllowFlip_Desc_Key
data.value: Allow tooltip to flip to opposite side if there's not enough space

data.name: TooltipBackgroundColor_Desc_Key
data.value: Background color of the tooltip (CSS color value, default: #323130)

data.name: TooltipTextColor_Desc_Key
data.value: Text color of the tooltip content (CSS color value, default: #ffffff)

data.name: BorderRadius_Desc_Key
data.value: Border radius of the tooltip in pixels (default: 8)

data.name: MaxWidth_Desc_Key
data.value: Maximum width of the tooltip in pixels (default: 400)

data.name: MinWidth_Desc_Key
data.value: Minimum width of the tooltip in pixels (default: 250)

data.name: TriggerType_Desc_Key
data.value: How the tooltip is triggered (hover, click, both)

data.name: ShowDelay_Desc_Key
data.value: Delay in milliseconds before showing tooltip on hover (default: 200)

data.name: HideDelay_Desc_Key
data.value: Delay in milliseconds before hiding tooltip when mouse leaves (default: 300)

data.name: AutoHideDelay_Desc_Key
data.value: Automatically hide tooltip after this many milliseconds (0 = disabled)

data.name: AutoAdjustRow_Desc_Key
data.value: Automatically adjust parent row layout to accommodate the tooltip

data.name: RowOptimization_Desc_Key
data.value: Optimization strategy for row layout (standard, compact, minimal)

data.name: RedirectUrl_Desc_Key
data.value: URL to navigate to when the tooltip icon is clicked

data.name: OpenInNewTab_Desc_Key
data.value: Open the redirect URL in a new browser tab
